titleStmt.title: The birth, life, and death of the Jewish unction. By John Daniel of Deresbury in Cheshire, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Daniel, John, of Deresbury, Cheshire.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "march 23 1650"; the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
